html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-16922008-10-09INDUSTRY,  , 
ActRadiocommunication Act
PrecisRADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(B)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY, SAFETY AND INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2008-1 with respect to jammers being used by the RCMP in carrying out their legislated responsibilities during the 12th Francophonie Summit, held in Quebec City, October 16 to 19, 2008. The exemption will apply to the RCMP for the specific dates of October 16 to 19, 2008, and is limited to a narrow geographic area of planned security sites for the Francophonie Summit in Quebec City, Quebec.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0292 Publication Date: 2008-10-29
AttachmentsAttachment

The exemption will apply to the RCMP for the specific dates of October 16 to 19, 2008, and is limited to a narrow geographic area of planned security sites for the Francophonie Summit in Quebec City, Quebec.
